question: Which Indian air carrier has aqui-hired airline technology company Travenues?
explanation:
Gurugram-headquartered Indian air carrier SpiceJet has recently aqui-hired Bengaluru-based airline technology company Travenues.
Trevenues is a wholly-owned subsidiary of the famous travel application ixigo. As per the pact, SpiceJet will absorb the travel technology team of the company and airline commerce platform. This will strengthen the e-Commerce exposure of SpiceJet.
